alert.note: Alert for Barton; Jasper (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 9:54PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL BARTON AND CENTRAL JASPER COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM CDT... At 954 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Alba, or near Carthage, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Joplin, Carthage, Webb City, Carl Junction, Oronogo, Carterville, Jasper, Airport Drive, Alba, Purcell, Nashville, Carytown, Neck City, Brooklyn Heights, Waco, Dudenville, Oakland Park and Maple Grove. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 43 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern Kansas...and southwestern Missouri.
